QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, hv_clin_obsn_dt, hv_enc_id, clin_obsn_typ_cd source_value, replace(clin_obsn_msrmt, chr(9), ' ') as value_as_string, clin_obsn_prov_id, clin_obsn_uom, 32827 type_concept_id, coalesce(clin_obsn_prov_id, '') || ';' || coalesce(clin_obsn_prov_taxnmy_id, '') ProviderIdKey from {sc}.emr_clin_obsn JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by ch.person_id
